msbt.message: Hello, everyone! The Bug-Off has begun!<10_7 arg="180" />
Hello, everyone! Just a reminder that the Bug-Off is on now!<10_7 arg="180" />

Hello, everyone! Please come celebrate the Countdown with us to ring in the new year!<10_7 arg="180" />
Happy New Year! May this year hold exciting adventures for us all!<10_8 arg="200" />
